Container.Description: Locally hosted mirror of musicbrainz for use in conjunction with headphones etc...[br][br][b]Requires the downloading of initial databases (VERY LARGE DOWNLOAD, > 5GB) from musicbrainz[br][br]Downloaded from [url]ftp://ftp.musicbrainz.org/pub/musicbrainz/data/fullexport/[/url] or the European mirror server at [url]ftp://eu.ftp.musicbrainz.org/MusicBrainz/data/fullexport/[/url][br][br]Fetch all .bz2 files from the latest release plus the MD5SUMS files and place them in the /import mapped folder, prior to starting the container for the first time.[br][br][b][span style="color: red"]YOU NEED A CODE FROM MUSICBRAINZ FOR THIS TO WORK, SEE HERE.[br][url]https://metabrainz.org/supporters/account-type[/url][/span]
